@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to every list
+        set listData to {}
+        repeat with aList in allLists
+            set end of listData to {id:(id of aList) as string, name:name of aList}
+        end repeat
+        return listData
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return eval(raw_output)
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set listReminders to every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderData to {{}}
+        repeat with aReminder in listReminders
+            set end of reminderData to {{id:(id of aReminder) as string, title:name of aReminder, dueDate:due date of aReminder, notes:body of aReminder}}
+        end repeat
+        return reminderData
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return eval(raw_output)
+
+def create_reminder(title: str, notes: str = None, due_date: str = None, list_name: str = None) -> str:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set newReminder to make new reminder
+        set name of newReminder to "{title.replace('"', '\\"')}"
+    '''
+
+    if notes:
+        script += f'set body of newReminder to "{notes.replace('"', '\\"')}"\n'
+
+    if due_date:
+        script += f'set due date of newReminder to date "{due_date}"\n'
+
+    if list_name:
+        script += f'''
+        set targetList to list "{list_name}"
+        if exists targetList then
+            move newReminder to targetList
+        else
+            set newList to make new list with properties {{name:"{list_name}"}}
+            move newReminder to newList
+        end if
+        '''
+    
+    script += '''
+        return id of newReminder as string
+    end tell
+    '''
+    
+    return run_applescript(script)

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    """"""
+
+    return [{'id': list_id, 'name': list_name} for list_id, list_name in zip(list_ids, list_names)]
+
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set reminderIDs to id of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderTitles to name of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderDueDates to due date of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderNotes to body of every reminder in targetList
+        return {{reminderIDs, reminderTitles, reminderDueDates, reminderNotes}} as JSON
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    print(get_all_lists())
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    """b'list id E4A69F9A-BA15-4296-B217-9F735652A0FA, list id B4B66208-A23D-4E10-B49A-36FF4DA3965A, list id 15DE35D7-37EF-4E2F-B271-57ADB4B71E18, list id 378C4398-75DC-418F-B77C-558137394A66, list id 93280B69-3D37-4FD4-91D0-83CFFD7D74E1, list id 129F5F6F-2749-4ECD-8983-C4A64400C6AE, list id 8CD4A536-5615-4C38-A3C3-FFA8F4BDAC8B\n'"""
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+
+    return [{'id': list_id, 'name': list_name} for list_id, list_name in zip(list_ids, list_names)]
+
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set reminderIDs to id of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderTitles to name of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderDueDates to due date of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderNotes to body of every reminder in targetList
+        return {{reminderIDs, reminderTitles, reminderDueDates, reminderNotes}} as JSON
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    print(get_all_lists())
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess

+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    """b'list id E4A69F9A-BA15-4296-B217-9F735652A0FA, list id B4B66208-A23D-4E10-B49A-36FF4DA3965A, list id 15DE35D7-37EF-4E2F-B271-57ADB4B71E18, list id 378C4398-75DC-418F-B77C-558137394A66, list id 93280B69-3D37-4FD4-91D0-83CFFD7D74E1, list id 129F5F6F-2749-4ECD-8983-C4A64400C6AE, list id 8CD4A536-5615-4C38-A3C3-FFA8F4BDAC8B\n'"""
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+
+    []
+
+    return [{'id': list_id, 'name': list_name} for list_id, list_name in zip(list_ids, list_names)]
+
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set reminderIDs to id of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderTitles to name of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderDueDates to due date of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderNotes to body of every reminder in targetList
+        return {{reminderIDs, reminderTitles, reminderDueDates, reminderNotes}} as JSON
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    print(get_all_lists())
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    """b'list id E4A69F9A-BA15-4296-B217-9F735652A0FA, list id B4B66208-A23D-4E10-B49A-36FF4DA3965A, list id 15DE35D7-37EF-4E2F-B271-57ADB4B71E18, list id 378C4398-75DC-418F-B77C-558137394A66, list id 93280B69-3D37-4FD4-91D0-83CFFD7D74E1, list id 129F5F6F-2749-4ECD-8983-C4A64400C6AE, list id 8CD4A536-5615-4C38-A3C3-FFA8F4BDAC8B\n'"""
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+
+    ids = [list_id for list_id in list_ids if list_id != ""]
+
+    return [{'id': list_id, 'name': list_name} for list_id, list_name in zip(list_ids, list_names)]
+
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set reminderIDs to id of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderTitles to name of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderDueDates to due date of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderNotes to body of every reminder in targetList
+        return {{reminderIDs, reminderTitles, reminderDueDates, reminderNotes}} as JSON
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    print(get_all_lists())
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    # ['list id E4A69F9A-BA15-4296-B217-9F735652A0FA', 'list id B4B66208-A23D-4E10-B49A-36FF4DA3965A', 'list id 15DE35D7-37EF-4E2F-B271-57ADB4B71E18', 'list id 378C4398-75DC-418F-B77C-558137394A66', 'list id 93280B69-3D37-4FD4-91D0-83CFFD7D74E1', 'list id 129F5F6F-2749-4ECD-8983-C4A64400C6AE', 'list id 8CD4A536-5615-4C38-A3C3-FFA8F4BDAC8B']
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
+        set reminderIDs to id of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderTitles to name of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderDueDates to due date of every reminder in targetList
+        set reminderNotes to body of every reminder in targetList
+        return {{reminderIDs, reminderTitles, reminderDueDates, reminderNotes}} as JSON
+    end tell
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    print(get_all_lists())
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes = json.loads(raw_output)
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetReminder to reminder id "{reminder_id}"
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the reminder
+    targetReminder
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return json.loads(raw_output)
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(id)[0]['id']
+    print(get_reminders_for_list(id))
+
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''

+    reminder_ids = 
+
+    return [
+        {
+            'id': reminder_id,
+            'title': reminder_title,
+            'dueDate': reminder_due_date,
+            'notes': reminder_note
+        }
+        for reminder_id, reminder_title, reminder_due_date, reminder_note in
+        zip(reminder_ids, reminder_titles, reminder_due_dates, reminder_notes)
+    ]
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetReminder to reminder id "{reminder_id}"
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the reminder
+    targetReminder
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return json.loads(raw_output)

+
+def main():

+    init_ol()
+    id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(id)[0]['id']
+    print(get_reminders_for_list(id))
+
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids = raw_output.split(', ')
+    ids = [reminder_id.split('//')[1] for reminder_id in reminder_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set targetReminder to reminder id "{reminder_id}"
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the reminder
+    targetReminder
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return json.loads(raw_output)
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(id)[0]
+    print(get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id))
+
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+from pydantic import BaseModel
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[str]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids = raw_output.split(', ')
+    ids = [reminder_id.split(' ')[2] for reminder_id in reminder_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+class Reminder(BaseModel):
+    id: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255")
+    name: str
+    body: str
+    due_date: str
+    completed: bool
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+-- Extract the reminder ID from the URL
+set reminderID to "{reminder_id}"
+
+-- Use Reminders app to get the reminder data
+tell application "Reminders"
+    set theReminder to (first reminder whose id is reminderID)
+    set reminderName to name of theReminder
+    set reminderBody to body of theReminder
+    set reminderDueDate to due date of theReminder
+    set reminderCompleted to completed of theReminder
+end tell
+
+-- Convert the reminder data to a comma-separated list
+set csvOutput to reminderID & ", " & 
+                 reminderName & ", " & 
+                 reminderBody & ", " & 
+                 reminderDueDate & ", " & 
+                 (reminderCompleted as string)
+
+-- Output the comma-separated list
+return csvOutput
+'''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return raw_output
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    list_id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(list_id)[0]
+    print(get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id))
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[str]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids = raw_output.split(', ')
+    ids = [reminder_id.split(' ')[2] for reminder_id in reminder_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+class Reminder(BaseModel):
+    id: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    name: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    body: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=1000)
+    due_date: str = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    completed: bool
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+-- Extract the reminder ID from the URL
+set reminderID to "{reminder_id}"
+
+-- Use Reminders app to get the reminder data
+tell application "Reminders"
+    set theReminder to (first reminder whose id is reminderID)
+    set reminderName to name of theReminder
+    set reminderBody to body of theReminder
+    set reminderDueDate to due date of theReminder
+    set reminderCompleted to completed of theReminder
+end tell
+
+-- Convert the reminder data to a comma-separated list
+set csvOutput to reminderID & ", " & 
+                 reminderName & ", " & 
+                 reminderBody & ", " & 
+                 reminderDueDate & ", " & 
+                 (reminderCompleted as string)
+
+-- Output the comma-separated list
+return csvOutput
+'''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return raw_output
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    list_id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(list_id)[0]
+    print(get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id))
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+import subprocess
+from typing import List, Dict, Any
+import json
+
+from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
+
+def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
+    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[str]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids = raw_output.split(', ')
+    ids = [reminder_id.split(' ')[2] for reminder_id in reminder_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+class Reminder(BaseModel):
+    id: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    name: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    body: str = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=1000)
+    due_date: str = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    completed: bool
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+-- Extract the reminder ID from the URL
+set reminderID to "{reminder_id}"
+
+-- Use Reminders app to get the reminder data
+tell application "Reminders"
+    set theReminder to (first reminder whose id is reminderID)
+    set reminderName to name of theReminder
+    set reminderBody to body of theReminder
+    set reminderDueDate to due date of theReminder
+    set reminderCompleted to completed of theReminder
+end tell
+
+-- Convert the reminder data to a comma-separated list
+set csvOutput to reminderID & ", " & 
+                 reminderName & ", " & 
+                 reminderBody & ", " & 
+                 reminderDueDate & ", " & 
+                 (reminderCompleted as string)
+
+-- Output the comma-separated list
+return csvOutput
+'''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return raw_output
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    list_id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(list_id)[0]
+    print(get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id))
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

+    output, error = process.communicate()
+    
+    if error:
+        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
+    
+    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()
+
+
+def get_all_lists() -> List[str]:
+    script = '''
+    tell application "Reminders"
+        set allLists to lists
+    end tell
+
+    -- Output the lists
+    allLists
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    list_ids = raw_output.split(", ")
+    ids = [list_id.split(" ")[2] for list_id in list_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+
+def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[str]:
+    script = f'''set listID to "{list_id}"
+
+      tell application "Reminders"
+          set targetList to first list whose id is listID
+          set remindersInList to reminders of targetList
+      end tell
+
+      -- Output the reminders
+      remindersInList
+    '''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    reminder_ids = raw_output.split(', ')
+    ids = [reminder_id.split(' ')[2] for reminder_id in reminder_ids]
+
+    return ids
+
+
+class Reminder(BaseModel):
+    id: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    name: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    body: str = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=1000)
+    due_date: str = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=255)
+    completed: bool = Field(False)
+
+
+def get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
+    script = f'''
+-- Extract the reminder ID from the URL
+set reminderID to "{reminder_id}"
+
+-- Use Reminders app to get the reminder data
+tell application "Reminders"
+    set theReminder to (first reminder whose id is reminderID)
+    set reminderName to name of theReminder
+    set reminderBody to body of theReminder
+    set reminderDueDate to due date of theReminder
+    set reminderCompleted to completed of theReminder
+end tell
+
+-- Convert the reminder data to a comma-separated list
+set csvOutput to reminderID & ", " & 
+                 reminderName & ", " & 
+                 reminderBody & ", " & 
+                 reminderDueDate & ", " & 
+                 (reminderCompleted as string)
+
+-- Output the comma-separated list
+return csvOutput
+'''
+    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
+    return raw_output
+
+
+def main():
+    """Main function"""
+    from dspygen.utils.dspy_tools import init_ol
+    init_ol()
+    list_id = get_all_lists()[0]
+    reminder_id = get_reminders_for_list(list_id)[0]
+    print(get_reminder_by_id(reminder_id))
+
+
+if __name__ == '__main__':
+    main()

import subprocess
from typing import List, Dict, Any

def run_applescript(script: str) -> str:
    process = subprocess.Popen(['osascript', '-e', script], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
    output, error = process.communicate()
    
    if error:
        raise RuntimeError(f"AppleScript Error: {error.decode('utf-8')}")
    
    return output.decode('utf-8').strip()

def get_all_lists() -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
    script = '''
    tell application "Reminders"
        set allLists to every list
        set listData to {}
        repeat with aList in allLists
            set end of listData to {id:(id of aList) as string, name:name of aList}
        end repeat
        return listData
    end tell
    '''
    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
    return eval(raw_output)

def get_reminders_for_list(list_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
    script = f'''
    tell application "Reminders"
        set targetList to list id "{list_id}"
        set listReminders to every reminder in targetList
        set reminderData to {{}}
        repeat with aReminder in listReminders
            set end of reminderData to {{id:(id of aReminder) as string, title:name of aReminder, dueDate:due date of aReminder, notes:body of aReminder}}
        end repeat
        return reminderData
    end tell
    '''
    raw_output = run_applescript(script)
    return eval(raw_output)

def create_reminder(title: str, notes: str = None, due_date: str = None, list_name: str = None) -> str:
    script = f'''
    tell application "Reminders"
        set newReminder to make new reminder
        set name of newReminder to "{title.replace('"', '\\"')}"
    '''

    if notes:
        script += f'set body of newReminder to "{notes.replace('"', '\\"')}"\n'

    if due_date:
        script += f'set due date of newReminder to date "{due_date}"\n'

    if list_name:
        script += f'''
        set targetList to list "{list_name}"
        if exists targetList then
            move newReminder to targetList
        else
            set newList to make new list with properties {{name:"{list_name}"}}
            move newReminder to newList
        end if
        '''
    
    script += '''
        return id of newReminder as string
    end tell
    '''
    
    return run_applescript(script)
